steps.step: Cook Elbow Macaroni according to package instructions. Drain
Melt Butter in a skillet. Slowly stir in Flour until smooth. Gradually add Cream. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Reduce heat and stir in Velveeta Cheese until melted
Add Elbow Macaroni to cheese mixture. Cook and stir for 3-4 minutes until heated through
